wikipedia_page.main: Dame Ingrid Victoria Allen,  (30 June 1932 – 21 April 2020) was Professor Emerita of Neuropathology at Queen’s University Belfast. She is mostly known for her research in pathology, neurodegeneration, neurovirology and demyelinating diseases, such as multiple sclerosis.

response: * Dame Ingrid Allen, Northern Irish neuropathologist.
